Package in.co.rays.proj4.controller

Class DoctorCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • in.co.rays.proj4.controller.BaseCtl
          • in.co.rays.proj4.controller.DoctorCtl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    @WebServlet(name="DoctorCtl",
            urlPatterns="/ctl/DoctorCtl")
public class DoctorCtl
extends in.co.rays.proj4.controller.BaseCtl
    DoctorCtl is a servlet controller that handles CRUD operations for Doctor records in the application.

    It extends BaseCtl and provides functionality for:

    • Preloading specialties (experties) for doctor form
    • Validating doctor form input
    • Populating DoctorBean from request parameters
    • Handling GET and POST requests for add, update, reset, and cancel operations

    URL mapping: /ctl/DoctorCtl

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
